messages.title: A personal message from Will BLAIR
messages.content: Being given the chance to represent you in Parliament is the greatest honour I've had... local renter Will Blair will stand up for you.

messages.title: Building affordable homes
messages.content: The lack of affordable housing in Holborn & St Pancras is a threat facing our community... The 'Rent to Buy' Scheme will also provide a £400pm investment to buyers on deposits...

messages.title: Backing Real Community Pubs in Holborn & St Pancras
messages.content: Pubs are the centre of Camden community life... Will's Camden Community Pubs campaign has seen ordinary pubs supported and protected...

messages.title: A Healthier Holborn & St Pancras
messages.content: Caring for Camden’s vulnerable residents is a huge priority for us all... Mental health has had fewer resources than other NHS services...

messages.title: COALITION OF CHAOS
messages.content: DON'T LET YOUR VOTE PUT ED MILIBAND INTO NO. 10 PROPPED UP BY OTHER PARTIES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Address the lack of affordable housing with initiatives like the 'Rent to Buy' Scheme, providing £400pm to buyers on deposits.
Support and protect ordinary pubs which are central to community life through the Camden Community Pubs campaign.
Prioritize caring for vulnerable residents with a focus on improving local health services and addressing mental health resources.

issues.health: Mental health has had fewer resources than other NHS services, which is why I have supported a £350 million investment into local services.

housing.content: The lack of affordable housing in Holborn & St Pancras is a threat facing our community... The 'Rent to Buy' Scheme will also provide a £400pm investment to buyers on deposits...

leaflet.personalStatement: Having grown up in a strong local community not from a wealthy family, I don’t take my opportunities for granted...

politicalExperience.role: Camden Councillor in Regent's Park, Highgate and KIT Council
politicalExperience.achievements: Works for the Royal Air Force Reservist, CAMRA member and a strong advocate for community pubs, Founding member of Camden Conservative Friends of Bangladesh

images.caption: Will Blair with local residents, discussing community involvement and health services.
